document.name: Startup
document.documentation: This document provides a visual way to edit the JSON configuration and is shown to the administrator by default on first login.

boolean.name: dontShowAgain
boolean.documentation: Allow the user to bypass the setup screen and set the showSetup value to false.

text.name: environmentIdentifier
text.description:
The description of this environment, e.g. Test, UAT. Leave this blank for production.
Note: If this is blank, the bootstrap user (if configured) will not be created for this instance until this is set to a non-blank value.

enum.name: mapType
enum.description: Which map technology would you like to use for this Skyve application? Note: Google Maps requires an API key.

integer.name: mapZoom
integer.description: What should the default zoom level be when opening a new map (value between 1-19)?

text.name: mapLayer
text.description: Google Map or Leaflet layer to show the map backdrop

geometry.name: mapCentre
geometry.description: Where to centre a new map when it opens

text.name: mailServerUrl
text.description: URL or IP address of the SMTP server to use

integer.name: mailPort
integer.description: Which port should be used to access the mail server? This is usually 25, 465 or 587 depending if it is secure or insecure.

boolean.name: mailBogusSend
boolean.description: If true, email is disabled and just logged, it will never be sent

text.name: mailTestRecipient
text.description: All emails will only be sent to this email address if specified

boolean.name: checkForBreachedPassword
boolean.documentation: Determines whether or not HaveIBeenPwned API is used as part of password validation.
boolean.description: When users try to create or change a password, this checks whether the new password has been compromised in known data breaches (requires internet access).

enum.name: captchaType
enum.description: To enable the forgot password function, this application must be registered for a captcha service. You may choose between Cloudflare Turnstile and Google Recaptcha.

text.name: apiGoogleMapsKey
text.description: If using Google Maps for your map type, specify your map key here

text.name: apiGoogleRecaptchaSiteKey
text.description: Google Recaptcha site key must be specified here.

text.name: apiGoogleRecaptchaSecretKey
text.description: Google Recaptcha secret key can be specified here to enable server-side validation for stronger security.

text.name: apiCloudflareTurnstileSiteKey
text.description: Cloudflare Turnstile site key must be specified here.

text.name: apiCloudflareTurnstileSecretKey
text.description: Cloudflare Turnstile secret key can be specified here to enable server-side validation for stronger security.

text.name: geoIPKey
text.description: By supplying a Geo IP API token (default is ipinfo.io), you can allow/disallow countries for registration and password reset.

enum.name: geoIPCountryListType
enum.description: This determines whether the countries selected should be allowed (whitelist) or denied (blacklist) from accessing the application.

enum.name: backupType
enum.description: Which external backup provider should be used this Skyve application? Note: additional charges may apply.

text.name: backupConnectionString
text.description: The connection string to the external backup location, e.g. DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=ACCOUNT_NAME;AccountKey=ACCOUNT_KEY;EndpointSuffix=core.windows.net.

text.name: backupDirectoryName
text.description:
The name of the top-level backup directory, e.g. application-name, this will be created if it does not exist.
This must be a valid DNS name, starting with a letter or number, containing only letters, numbers and the dash character. Every dash must be immediately preceeded and followed by a ltter or number.
Must be from 3 to 63 characters long.

validator.validationMessage: This must be a valid DNS name, starting with a letter or number, containing only letters, numbers and the dash character. Every dash must be immediately preceeded and followed by a ltter or number.

condition.name: backupTypeAzure
condition.description: True when the selected backup type is Azure Blob Storage

condition.name: mapTypeGmap
condition.description: True when the selected map type is Google Maps

condition.name: singleTenant
condition.description: True when this application has a default customer specified (is single tenant)

condition.name: googleRecaptcha
condition.description: True when the captcha type is Google Recaptcha

condition.name: hasGeoIPKey
condition.description: True when a Geo IP key/token has been set

condition.name: cloudflareTurnstile
condition.description: True when the captcha type is Cloudflare Turnstile

condition.name: noCaptcha
condition.description: True when no captcha type is selected
